```{r}
library(tidyverse)
```

```{r}
march_madness_data <- read_csv("~/march-madness-predictor/data/Bio_185_March_Madness_Data.csv")
conference_data <- read_csv("~/march-madness-predictor/data/mach_madness_conference_list.csv")
```

```{r}
new_data <- march_madness_data %>%
  left_join(conference_data, by = c("Favorite" = "Team"))
```

```{r}
new_data <- new_data %>%
  select(Favorite, Underdog, Round, Conference, Year)
```

```{r}
view(new_data)
```

### HERE

```{r}
new_data %>%
  mutate(Conference = ifelse(
    Conference = NA ~ "Non Power 6", NULL
    ))
```
